get.description: API endpoint to get a list of income-expenditure report. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

post.summary: Insert a training center income-expenditure report
post.description: API endpoint to store a training center income-expenditure report. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

_response_status.message: Training center progress report added successfully.

get.description: API endpoint to get all Exam Subjects. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

post.description: API endpoint to Create Exam Subjects. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

get.description: API endpoint to get a Exam Subjects. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

put.description: API endpoint to update a Exam Subjects. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

delete.description: API endpoint to delete a Exam Subjects. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

rto_country_id.description: Must exist in country_id column in rto_countries table

password.description: Must contain upper case and lower case letter and number.Minimum length 8

password_confirmation.description: Must contain upper case and lower case letter and number.Minimum length 8

center_location_type.description: 1 => On Institute Premises, 2 => On Branch Premises, 3 => On Training Center Premises

trainingCentersWithBatches.description: Training Center with active OR/AND upcoming batches

religion.description: '1 => Islam, 2 => Hinduism, 3 => Christianity, 4 => Buddhism, 5 => Judaism, 6 => Sikhism, 7 => Ethnic, 8 => Agnostic/Atheist

freedom_fighter_status.description: 1 => No, 2 => Yes, 3=> child of a freedom fighter, 4 => grand child of a freedom fighter
